document_data.caption: A map showing Sighing Maiden's Walk and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Sighing Maiden's Walk
document_data.mainbody: '''Sighing Maiden's Walk''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Sighing Maiden's Walk was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on the the [[Street of Glances]] where it branched southwest to end on the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]]. Sighing Maiden's Walk was intersected by [[Ivory Street]], [[Sniff Alley]] and [[Staghunter's Way]].
